name: entra-remove-oauth2-permission-grants
title: CLI - Remove OAuth2 permission grants in a specific enterprise application (or service principal) in Entra ID
shortDescription: Find and remove all OAuth2 permission grants that have been assigned to a specific enterprise application (or service principal).
longDescription: Find and remove all OAuth2 permissions assigned to a specific enterprise application by selecting one of the following removal options: **All permissions** / Permissions granted **by an administrator** / Permissions consented to **by users**.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
